metadata.title: CVE-2017-14261 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In the SDK in Bento4 1.5.0-616, the AP4_StszAtom class in Ap4StszAtom.cppfile contains a Read Memory Access Violation vulnerability. It is possibleto exploit this vulnerability by opening a crafted .MP4 file.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
